I have a number of asserts (the new jdk1.4+ asserts) and I want to 
make sure that my junit tests are run with those asserts enabled.  
I'm using the following ant task:

 <target name="runtests" depends="compile">
    <junit haltonfailure="yes">
    <jvmarg value="-ea"/>
    <formatter type="plain" usefile="false"/>
	   <classpath>
	     <pathelement path="${classpath}"/>
	   </classpath>
       <test name="FlightView.FVTests"/> 
    </junit>
  </target>

But it isn't working.  Ideas?

Ted
